name: David Ramirez
text: Dude I'm sorry if you're offended but the fact is you are supporting a guy whose platform is that he is a mass murderer. I am looking at his actions and they are deafening.    You want a system where one man chooses who lives and dies and nobody can tell whether or not he got the right people because you trust this man, but you aren't thinking about what comes after.
